form.label: Execution Artifacts
form.description: correlates outputs from PECmd, AppCompatCacheParser and AmcacheParser

search.query: ((`shimcache` LastModifiedTimeUTC = "*") OR (`amcache`) OR (`prefetch`)) |eval executable = coalesce(ExecutableName, Path, FullPath) |eval executable = lower(executable) |rex field=executable "(?<executable_name>[^\\\]+$)" |fields executable_name | dedup executable_name

panel.title: Seen Executables - clicking on hashes redirects to VT

search.query: ((`shimcache` LastModifiedTimeUTC = "*") OR (`amcache`) OR (`prefetch`)) $text_filter$ |eval executable = coalesce(ExecutableName, Path, FullPath) |eval executable = lower(executable) |rex field=executable "(?<executable_name>[^\\\]+$)" |stats values(executable) as executable values(SHA1) as SHA1 values(source) as source values(LastRun) as LastRun values(LastModifiedTimeUTC) as LastModifiedTimeUTC values(FileKeyLastWriteTimestamp) as FileKeyLastWriteTimestamp by executable_name | table executable_name LastRun LastModifiedTimeUTC FileKeyLastWriteTimestamp executable SHA1 source | search executable_name IN ( $selected_executable$ )
